CustomField.formula: CASE( RecordType.Name , "TC",(( total_discounts__c + total_payment_received__c + TC_Total_Commission__c ) - ( PAX_Travelling__c * OpenCreditNoRefund__c )), (( total_discounts__c + total_payment_received__c ) - ( PAX_Travelling__c * OpenCreditNoRefund__c )) )
CustomField.label: OpenCreditAmount
